response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am confident it will serve as a valuable asset in your endeavors. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $950,000, which I believe strikes a fair balance between my expectations and the immense value it holds for you. I look forward to discussing the details and bringing this remarkable product into your possession. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 950000}
